name: Gladiatory
description:
Assemble a squad of different gladiators, improve your hero character's skills and equip him with the best stuff.
Make tactical decisions to expand your ludus - for example, mine more gold or train your troops.
Watch your gladiators fight or take part and actively take control of your hero character.

30 Arena Levels
1 Endboss
9 different unit classes
Elite Units
Predator Units
